internalComponents.name: Catalog Manager
internalComponents.description: Responsible for retrieving and searching product information. It abstracts the data access logic (DAO) and provides product details to the presentation layer.

internalComponents.name: Shopping Cart Manager
internalComponents.description: Manages the temporary state of a user's shopping session. It handles adding/removing items and calculating subtotals before an order is placed.

internalComponents.name: Customer Account Manager
internalComponents.description: Handles user registration, authentication (SignOn), and profile management (Contact Info, Credit Card, Preferences).

internalComponents.name: Order Manager
internalComponents.description: Handles the creation and persistence of customer orders. It initiates the fulfillment workflow by sending order data to the processing center.

internalComponents.name: Order Processing Center (OPC)
internalComponents.description: The core workflow engine that manages the lifecycle of an order. It handles order approval (manual or automatic), coordinates with suppliers, and tracks order status.

internalComponents.name: Supplier Manager
internalComponents.description: Simulates an external B2B partner. It receives purchase orders from the OPC, checks inventory, and sends back invoices/shipment notifications.

internalComponents.name: Notification Service
internalComponents.description: Responsible for generating and sending emails to customers regarding order status updates (Received, Approved, Shipped).

internalComponents.name: Administration Manager
internalComponents.description: Provides capabilities for administrators to view sales statistics and manually approve or deny pending orders.

internalComponents.name: Unique ID Generator
internalComponents.description: A utility component responsible for generating unique primary keys for orders and other entities.

externalDependencies.name: Cloudscape/Oracle Database
externalDependencies.description: Stores persistent data for Catalog, Customers, Orders, and Inventory.

externalDependencies.name: JMS Provider
externalDependencies.description: Handles asynchronous messaging between the Pet Store, OPC, and Supplier components (Queues and Topics).

externalDependencies.name: JavaMail Service
externalDependencies.description: Used by the Notification Service to send SMTP emails to customers.
